nodes.text: The Harda system was a star system that was located within the Outer Rim Territories' Phelleem sector as a part of the Slice region. The system was the origin point of the Hardan plague, a deadly disease that could be carried by winged rodents known as Bogan's brown nafen.
The Harda system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square S-7.
